    HTTP Routing Table

    /clouds | /keys | /mist.io | /providers
     
    /clouds
    GET /clouds
    GET /clouds/{cloud_id}/images
    GET /clouds/{cloud_id}/locations
    GET /clouds/{cloud_id}/machines
    GET /clouds/{cloud_id}/machines/{machine_id}/shell?host={host_ip}&command={shell_command}
    GET /clouds/{cloud_id}/sizes
    POST /clouds
    POST /clouds/{cloud_id}
    POST /clouds/{cloud_id}/machines
    POST /clouds/{cloud_id}/machines/{machine_id}
    POST /clouds/{cloud_id}/machines/{machine_id}/metadata
    PUT /clouds/{cloud_id}
    DELETE /clouds/{cloud_id}
     
    /keys
    GET /keys
    GET /keys/{key_id}/private
    GET /keys/{key_id}/public
    POST /keys
    POST /keys/{key_id}
    PUT /keys
    PUT /keys/{key_id}
    DELETE /keys/{key_id}
     
    /mist.io
    POST mist.io/auth
     
    /providers
    GET /providers
